objects.text:
• Premium Cotton Material
• Modern Typography Design
• Versatile Round Neck
• Empowering Message

product_details.name: Inspirational 'Believe in Yourself' Premium Cotton T-Shirt
product_details.description:
• Stylish navy blue color perfect for casual and motivational wear
• Modern typography design with layered 'BELIEVE' text effect
• High-quality cotton material for maximum comfort
• Versatile round neck design suitable for all occasions
• Empowering message that boosts confidence and self-belief
• Durable print technology ensures long-lasting design
• Easy to care for and machine washable
• Available in multiple sizes for perfect fit
• Ideal for both casual wear and workout sessions
• Perfect gift for motivation seekers and self-improvement enthusiasts

banner_details:
This banner design features a bold, empowering theme with a modern aesthetic. The layout is divided into four quadrants with a grid-style background and subtle circular and linear decorative elements. The top-left quadrant showcases a strong motivational headline using text layers `heading`, `subheading`, and `tagline`, combining bold and futuristic fonts. The product image (`product_image`) is positioned in the top-right quadrant, aligned against a darker blue background to maintain prominence. Below, the banner emphasizes key product features using the `description` text layer and includes a visually striking price point (`price`) and call-to-action (`cta`) set against a white button (`cta_background`). A short promotional phrase (`promotional_text`) reinforces the offer. 

**Color Palette:**
- Midnight Navy: `#1A2845`
- Slate Blue: `#2A3C61`
- Electric Blue: `#4B6FE8`
- Soft White: `#F5F5F5`
- Pure White: `#FFFFFF`
product_color: The product image showcases a navy blue t-shirt featuring a motivational typographic design. The background color is a deep navy (#0D1C34), evoking calmness and confidence. "BELIEVE" is repeated in a subtle, contrasting slate blue shade (#4A5A6A), softly blending with the t-shirt while maintaining visibility through layering and opacity. The phrase "In yourself" is scripted in a lighter, elegant periwinkle blue (#A0B3CC), standing out distinctly among the bold text. These colors are carefully blended to create visual balance while emphasizing the key message. For an advertisement banner, the palette should include #0D1C34, #4A5A6A, #A0B3CC, and white (#FFFFFF) for contrast and clarity.
